attributes.action: Remove MPs gold plated pensions in favour of a more fairer scheme !
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bring MPs final salary pensions in line with private sector schemes. MPs currently only contribute a max £6k a year towards their pensions for an annuity of £40k. The Private sector would need to squirrel away over £21k a year to get the same ! Hardly seems fair does it ? Join me in lobbying the removal of these scandalous schemes that is costing all of us dearly and lining the pockets of our MPs !! Equality is a word this government used to take seriously.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
